body: Some ratfolk spend as much time as they can aboveground and become very fast runners. This comes at the cost of their night vision, which becomes less acute after years of sunlight. These ratfolk gain low-light vision and have a base speed of 30 feet. This racial trait replaces darkvision and slow speed.
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ratfolk/New Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Surface Sprinter
name: Surface Sprinter
